nodes.text: The human female monitor of First Order General Armitage Hux was on the bridge of the Star Destroyer Finalizer during the Battle of D'Qar. She was the one who intercepted Poe Dameron's message as the pilot contacted Hux from Black One. The cuff-title on her left sleeve said "Ro," designating her as a sergeant.
The character was portrayed by Kate Dickie in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.
